bibl.title: Alexandria in Late Antiquity. Topography and Social Conflict. (Ancient Society and History.)
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The Urban Setting. - 3. The Social World. - 4. The Jewish Community. - 5. The Pagan Community. - 6. The Christian Community: The Interior Landscape. - 7. The Inner Life of the Christian Community: Clergy and People. - 8. Community and Factionalism in the Christian Community. - 9. Intercommunal Conflict during Late Antiquity. - 10. Conclusions. - 11. Epilogue: From Roman Alexandria to Islamic al-Iskandariyyah. - Appendix. Chronological Table of Emperors, Prefects, and Patriarchs: Fourth and Fifth Centuries. Notes. Index.
